title: Is America’s Education Problem Really Just a Teacher Problem? (Rebroadcast)
description: If U.S. schoolteachers are indeed "just a little bit below average," it's not really their fault. So what should be done about it?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
